strings: <voice_0x01000DF4><se_def>King Pavan: What a pleasant surprise! It's so nice to see you all back at my humble home.

<voice_0x01000DF5><se_def>King Pavan: I'll never forget that day you brought
the vision of my dear Sasha to me...
I cannot thank you enough.
<voice_0x01000DF6><se_def>King Pavan: So what brings you to my kingdom on this fine and sunny day?

<voice_0x01000DF7><se_def>King Pavan: ...I see.
The Moonshadow harp is indeed in Ascantha.

<voice_0x01000DF8><se_def>King Pavan: It has been one of our treasures since
ancient times.

<voice_0x01000DF9><se_def>King Pavan: But I cannot deny my honoured friends' request.
It would be my pleasure to give it to you.

<voice_0x01000DFA><se_def>King Pavan: It is locked securely away in the vault below
the castle. Allow me to escort you there.
<voice_0x01000DFB><se_def>King Pavan: This brooch has been passed down through many generations of the royal family.

<voice_0x01000DFD><se_def>King Pavan: The vault is just below us.
Come with me.

<voice_0x01000DFE><se_def>King Pavan: ...I don't believe it!
How can this be...!?

<voice_0x01000DFF><se_def>King Pavan: It must be the work of thieves!
I will not stand for this!
<voice_0x01000E00><se_def>King Pavan: ...It appears that the unthinkable has happened and the Moonshadow harp has been stolen.
<voice_0x01000E01><se_def>King Pavan: The culprits could still be inside this tunnel.

<voice_0x01000E02><se_def>King Pavan: It's too dangerous for you to go after them.
You mustn't set foot inside.

<voice_0x01000E03><se_def>King Pavan: I will summon the castle guards.
They'll get the harp back!
You mark my words!
